title: cured salmon with cucumber ketchup and chargrilled cucumber
description: Cured fish sounds difficult, but it really only needs a little time. Then you can really show off with tapioca crisps and cucumber ketchup.
ingredients: 1 x 500g/1lb 2oz side of salmon, skin on, pin bones removed
1 cucumber, peeled, with the ends and round edges trimmed off
large handful watercress or 2 tbsp watercress sprouts
